All automated tests for JSON output format pass in this cycle.
traceability.notes: The JSON output feature fully satisfies all acceptance criteria: a --format=json flag produces valid, comprehensive JSON with correct exit codes and silent mode; errors are JSON-formatted; default behavior remains table output; help text includes the format option.
